title: ～か～まいか (〜ka 〜maika)
short_explanation: Used to express a dilemma or indecision between two options or actions

examples.jp: このプロジェクトを引き受けるか引き受けないまいか、まだ決めていない。
examples.romaji: Kono purojekuto wo hikiukeru ka hikiukenai maika, mada kimeteinai.
examples.en: I haven't decided whether to take on this project or not.

title: ～からこそ (〜kara koso)
short_explanation: Express the emphasis on the reason; 'precisely because', 'it is precisely because'.

examples.jp: 失敗したからこそ、成功の意味がわかる。
examples.romaji: Shippai shita kara koso, seikou no imi ga wakaru.
examples.en: It is precisely because I failed that I understand the meaning of success.
